column5: Our MSc in Management and Business Analytics can help companies accurately predict future events that are related to the actions of consumers, market trends, and also assist in developing more efficient processes and appropriate strategic choices. This course will prepare you for a successful career in a commercial or not-for-profit organisation.You will learn to:
column7: Home (UK) full time - £11,400 Home (UK) part time - £5,700 Home (UK) sandwich (placement) - £2,000 International full time - £16,800 International sandwich (placement) - £2,000
column9: 1 or 2 years full time, 2 years part time
